title: design a web application project in java
desc:  Application for assessment. Desktop and App based version. To be hosted onandroid/windows/ios. Cloud based application. All data to be stored in Cloud. Platform: preferably Java Data center hosting- India1. General Features:a) Ability to take exam of multiple students in a batch simultaneously.b) Provision to upload batch details. Template would be provided. Creation ofcorresponding forms.c) Test by invitation on email or SMS on phone.d) One-time unique test code to be generated for each student.e) Automatic Trigger mail at the first login of the Candidate.f) Ability to take exam of more than 50 batches at the same time without lag or decrease in speed.g) Ability to capture photograph while students are taking exam and capture video while students aretaking exam. Random click pictures while student is giving exam.h) Ability to proctor from remote.i.e. Ability to see the class while the exam is on.i) Offline capability of taking exam on tablets. Sync when internet is not connected and then re syncwhen the exam is over.j) Exam would be theory, practical and Viva, the marks scored in each function should not be visibleto Assessor.k) Candidate attendance management by id's.l) Remote screen freezing. Does not allow candidate to surf any other website. IP Blockingm) Remote Video Interview for Viva. Remote interview scheduling.n) Capability to rest the exam in case the exam is interrupted by any external source. i.e. power off,mistake in clicking submit button. Resume test in case of power failure or internet disconnected.o) Back end activation and deactivation of exam.p) Ability to revisit the questions not answered.q) Capability of move forward only in case required.r) Import/export of data in excel/PDF.s) Object level security of formst) GPS positioning of assessor and candidates2) Online Monitoring (remote proctoring console)3. Question paper:a) Cability of question paper shuffling. Resequencing the question paper.b) Capability of shuffling 4 options (Answers)c) Cability of Voice/image based questionsd) Capability of questions in multiple languagee) Making all question mandatoryf) Negative markingg) Capability to load question paper via excel sheet

title: App development for money tracking and statistics
desc: Need an ios app that tracks peoples expenditure, more specifically bet winnings and losses. Additionally we need these statistics transformed into graphs. We also need a social aspect, where one can add friends and compare overall statistics and figures.Features we need:1. A 6 step process where the user selects the bet they have placed via multiple choice selections and input text boxes.2. Tutorial for new users that simply shows them how to operate the app.3. User profile pages4. Search function to find users5. a 'Pending Bets' page that allows users to easily mark off if they have won or lost that bet, so it can be translated in their stats on their profile page.OR6. A verification system whereby we as the moderators can update game results in the apps backend upon their completion so it automatically update users profiles on whether they have won or lost that bet, to eliminate cheating of the system.

title: Build an app like get-trackr.io - for tracking via BLE beacon technology -- 2 - 11/11/2017 21:20 EST
desc: We need an ios app and an android app like the one used by [url removed, login to view]The app should read BLE data transmitted by the beacons attached to the app. Other features:App should show signal strength of each attached beacon.User should be able to attach more than 1 beacons to one app.App should show position of the beacon on a mapIt should trigger an alert/notification when any attached beacon is separated from the app - goes out of range or stops signalingIt should show last known position before the beacon was separatedThe app should be able to trigger the ringer on the beacon. Conversely, a push button on the beacon should be able to trigger the ringer on the phoneIf a beacon is reported as lost then that beacon should be attached to all apps installed on all smart phones.Any other feature you see in the original trackr app. See the app and also the videos of the app posted on their site.Our beacon will be standard ble beacons that will emit in both formats : ibeacon and eddystone. It will have a ringer which can be activated and deactivated via bluetooth signals and will also have a button that will send a bluetooth signal that the app will sense and start ringing. The tracking, mapping, last known good position, alerts/notifications will use standard protocols/formats of ibeacon and eddystone whereas we will give you additional info about the 2 way ringer.All communications are local bluetooth except for the lost beacon reporting which needs internet connectivity. And of course the mapping feature which might require access to google maps.

title: Build an app like get-trackr.io - for tracking via BLE beacon technology -- 2 - 11/11/2017 21:17 EST

title: Design a web platform for Books to Africa
desc: Efiwe is seeking collaborations to reach schools and students in the US and help deliver books to African tertiary Libraries.Efiwe is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization dedicated to collecting and delivering University textbooks to African post-secondary institutions' libraries. This will help alleviate the lack in African post-secondary institutions and expose the students to relevant texts.Efiwe is a Non-Profit Organization based in the United States with the aim of continuing to enrich the educational experiences of Africans in higher institutions.We believe that access to more and better books/textbooks will significantly impact on the human capital in Africa and therefore lead to a more educated populace and a better Africa.Efiwe is seeking student volunteers that will help build a web platform for management and inventory of the donated books, I am also hoping to leverage the community to reach university campus and get relevant links that will help reach students in colleges/universities in the US.[url removed, login to view]

desc: I am currently looking into creating an app for people to find workers for different jobs etc. Basically, I want people to open the app and sign up with Facebook or email, then they need to put in their credit card details through which they will pay $5 per month.After they have logged in and set up payment they will put in their suburb, or select it through GPS, and then they will select a job e.g. babysitting, gardening, labour work and it will come up with a bunch of profiles who they can select from and it will come up with a photo, bio and contact details of the person.On the other hand, there needs to be a separate sign up for people who are wanting to work, where they put in a photo, a bio, contact details and they need to select what jobs they can do and put in their suburb.I am looking for a quote on price, how many hours it will take to build a complicated app like this and the hourly rate that you would want. I would need this done fairly soon.It also needs to look very clean, and nice so that people are satisfied with the app. More information and photos will come later.Please get back to me soon,Connor
